note.p: Career: Councillor to the King of Prussia (1711-1732); Senator of Geneva (1739-1767)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Foster; printed list

Notes: Proposed by John Chamberlayne. Not on PL for 1774 - noted as having died 1772/3 in anniversary meeting of 30 Nov 1773. Also added to BR entry, taken from Lamoine List (1992): Bonet de St Germain, Andreas Ludwig Friedrich (1670-? 1762) - the same man?
